Q_DESC:
Write Java program to allow the user to input the amount of deposit, yearly interest rate (percentage), and income tax(percentage). 

Then the program will calculate the amount of interest that the person earns in the year amount_dep*(rate/100); //amount of interest before tax calculation

tax_amount=interest_earned*(tax/100);
interest_earned-=tax; //the final interest earned

Input Format:
1.Amount of deposit
2.Early interest rate
3.Enter income tax rate
